ygData.subject: Re: Skulletron Will Live!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... raptor was the traitor?  Skulletron was the ally?  Torca did not beleive it.  He was a descendant of Optimus Prime(Not moding Dachande.  I was in the RPG

:::Torca:::

::He sees all of the things that Skulletron was showing him.  Iron 
raptor was the traitor?  Skulletron was the ally?  Torca did not 
beleive it.  He was a descendant of Optimus Prime(Not moding 
Dachande.  I was in the RPG before you and made Torca a descendent of 
Prime.  please accept this), and shared the common sense that the 
great leader had shown in the past.  he knew that the whole idea was 
foolish::
Torca: You are a very bad liar Skulletron.  If your our ally why did 
you fire on us?  Let me guess- Iron Raptor made you do it?




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Skulletron::
> 
>         Skulletron got hit by Klant's missile, and flew backwards, 
and hit the wall, then fell down to the ground in a sitting position 
against the wall.
> 
>          Then, Skulletron's chest was continuously pounded by 25 
shots from Torca.
> 
>          Mechfluid leaked from all over Skulletron, he was almost 
completely covered in it.  Skulletron got up.
> 
>         "I........." Skulletron coughed up mechfluid, "I'll kill 
you....." He spat out more mechfluid, "If it's...." He wiped 
mechfluid from his mouth, "If it's.......The 
last.....Thing........I.......................Do........." He 
muttered out.
> 
>           Skulletron then transformed to beast mode.
> 
>          This would be his only chance to survive.
> 
>          Skulletron connected his mind with Torca and Klant's mind.
> 
>          Then, he did what he loved to do.
> 
>           Skulletron projected an image of himself into Torca and 
Klant's mind.
> 
>           Then, he sent an image of Iron Raptor into their minds.
> 
>           Skulletron now put a voice into their heads.
> 
>           "Maximals.................Stop 
this...this....madness............Skulletron is not the 
enemy......................Iron Raptor is the true 
enemy............................She plotted Dinobot and Tavatron 
getting lost.................She plotted Skulletron coming into the 
base...............You Maximals are blind!!!!!!  No matter how much 
Iron Raptor seems to be on your side, she will always be the 
enemy...............She is using you...........Spare Skulletron's 
life, and attack the real enemy!!!!" The voice said, cold and grim.
> 
>            Skulletron projected an image of what was going to 
happen to all of them during a big battle, and Iron Raptor laughing 
maniacally.
